title: Successful login with valid email and password
description: Verify that users can log in successfully using a valid email and password combination.

steps.description: Navigate to the login page.
Enter valid email and password.
Click the login button.
Verify that the user is logged in and redirected to the dashboard.

title: Login failure with invalid credentials
description: Verify that login fails with incorrect email or password and appropriate error message is shown.

steps.description: Navigate to the login page.
Enter invalid email or password.
Click the login button.
Verify that login is denied and an error message is displayed.

title: Logout successfully ends session
description: Verify that clicking logout ends the user session and returns to the login page.

steps.description: Log in successfully.
Click the logout button.
Verify that user session is cleared and user is redirected to the login page.

title: Dashboard loads primary content metrics within performance threshold
description: Verify that the dashboard loads with all primary content metrics displayed within 1.5 seconds under normal network conditions.

steps.description: Log in successfully to reach the dashboard.
Verify that dashboard key widgets (calls due, task stats, active clients, prioritized outreach, recent activity) load completely within 1.5 seconds.

title: Client creation adds new client visible in client list
description: Verify that adding a new client adds the client immediately to the client list and all relevant views.

steps.description: Navigate to client management page.
Fill required client details and submit to create new client.
Verify the new client appears immediately in the client list and dashboard metrics update accordingly.

title: Client deletion removes client from all relevant views
description: Verify that deleting a client removes it from the client list, dashboard metrics, and any associated follow-ups.

steps.description: Select an existing client from client management.
Perform delete client operation and confirm deletion.
Verify the client is removed from client list and no longer counted in dashboard metrics or follow-ups.

title: Marking a call done updates follow-up status and removes client from Calls Due list
description: Verify that marking a call as done on the dashboard updates the client follow-up status and removes that client from the calls due list.

steps.description: Log in and navigate to the dashboard.
Identify a client in Calls Due list and mark its call as done.
Verify that the client's follow-up status is updated accordingly and client disappears from Calls Due list.

title: Import clients from Excel file correctly creates client records
description: Verify that importing client data from a valid Excel file creates correct client records without data loss or errors.

steps.description: Navigate to the client import feature.
Upload a valid Excel file containing multiple client records.
Verify that all clients in the Excel file are imported and appear correctly in the client list.

title: Import Excel file with invalid data shows error and prevents import
description: Verify that attempting to import client data from an Excel file with invalid or malformed data triggers error handling and prevents import.

steps.description: Navigate to the client import feature.
Upload an Excel file containing invalid or missing client fields.
Verify that the system displays validation errors and does not create any client records.

title: Task creation and display in Task Manager
description: Verify users can create tasks with required details and new tasks appear immediately in the Task Manager with correct status and priority.

steps.description: Navigate to Task Manager.
Create a new task with valid details including priority and due date.
Verify that the new task appears in the task list with correct status and priority.

title: Task status update triggers progress visualization update
description: Verify updating the status of a task updates the progress visualization and metrics accordingly.

steps.description: Navigate to Task Manager and locate an existing task.
Change the status of the task (e.g., from pending to completed).
Verify that the task status updates and the progress visualization reflects the updated completion metrics.

title: Task filtering by priority and status functions correctly
description: Verify the task filtering feature correctly displays tasks based on selected priority and status filters.

steps.description: Navigate to Task Manager.
Apply filters by priority (e.g., High) and status (e.g., Pending).
Verify only tasks matching the selected filters are displayed.

title: Calendar displays scheduled calls and tasks in month and day views
description: Verify scheduled calls and tasks are displayed correctly on calendar in both month and day views with accurate details.

steps.description: Navigate to the Calendar page.
Verify all calls and tasks scheduled are visible on the calendar in both month and day views.

title: Calendar event rescheduling updates data and UI
description: Verify users can reschedule calls/tasks from the calendar and changes persist with real-time UI updates.

steps.description: Navigate to Calendar and select a scheduled call or task.
Drag and drop or use controls to change its scheduled date/time.
Verify the event is updated persistently and the calendar UI reflects the new schedule immediately.

title: Calendar event status toggling updates call/task status correctly
description: Verify toggling status of calls/tasks from the calendar view updates the underlying data and UI consistently.

steps.description: Select a call or task in calendar view.
Toggle completion or follow-up status.
Verify that the status change is saved and reflected across all relevant views including dashboard and client management.

title: Add, edit, and delete nodes in Organization Tree correctly updates hierarchy
description: Verify adding child nodes, editing node data, and recursive deletion of nodes in the Organization Tree updates the hierarchy and UI correctly.

steps.description: Navigate to Team Management page.
Add a child node to an existing node with valid data.
Verify the child node appears correctly in the organization tree with accurate hierarchy.
Edit the details of a node.
Verify the node updates are reflected immediately in the organization tree.
Delete a node that has children.
Verify the node and all its descendant nodes are removed from the tree.

title: Organization Tree updates reflect in real-time across sessions
description: Verify that changes made to the Organization Tree in one user session are reflected in other active user sessions instantly.

steps.description: Open the Organization Tree in two separate user sessions.
Add or edit a node in one session.
Verify that the changes are reflected in the other session's Organization Tree in real-time.

title: User profile update of personal details reflects correctly
description: Verify that editing personal details in user profile updates the data correctly and persists on reload.

steps.description: Navigate to User Profile page.
Edit personal details fields and save changes.
Verify changes persist after page reload and appear correctly in the profile.

title: Password change updates credentials and invalidates old sessions
description: Verify that changing the password updates authentication credentials and invalidates old sessions securely.

steps.description: Navigate to User Profile password change section.
Enter current password and new password, then submit.
Verify password is updated and previous sessions are invalidated requiring re-login.

title: Input validation enforces required fields and valid formats
description: Verify all input fields enforce required constraints and format validations such as phone numbers and emails across forms.

steps.description: Navigate to various input forms (client addition, task creation, profile update).
Attempt to submit with missing or invalid fields like missing required fields or invalid phone number format.
Verify that submission is blocked and appropriate error messages are shown.

title: Bulk delete on large data sets operates within acceptable performance
description: Verify bulk deleting 500 clients/tasks completes within 5 seconds maintaining UI responsiveness.

steps.description: Select 500 clients or tasks for bulk deletion.
Perform bulk delete operation and confirm.
Verify deletion completes within 5 seconds and UI updates accordingly without freezing.

title: Firestore security rules enforce data isolation per authenticated user
description: Verify that users cannot access or modify data belonging to other users violating access policies.

steps.description: Log in as User A and attempt to access User B's data via API calls or UI manipulation.
Verify that all unauthorized access attempts are denied and proper error responses are returned.

title: Offline usage supports data view and editing with synchronization on reconnection
description: Verify the application supports offline data caching allowing users to view and edit data that synchronize correctly when connectivity is restored.

steps.description: Put device in offline mode.
View cached dashboard data and edit client or task records.
Restore internet connection.
Verify that all offline edits are synchronized successfully and UI reflects latest data.
